name: Look Around: There Are Ghosts Nearby
name_original: Look Around: There Are Ghosts Nearby
description:
LOOK AROUND THERE ARE GHOSTS NEARBY

Look Around: There Are Ghosts Nearby is a top-down-shooter game about trying to survive waves of different ghosts. Reveal and shoot ghosts with your super lantern, but always remember to Look Around.

Playing as a child, without any help from your parents, you need to free your house from all ghosts. Using the furniture in  your favor, running in circles or even just shooting ghosts randomly, you'll need to survive waves to reach your safety.

shoot'em all
